General.Name: Columbia Care Inc
General.Description: Columbia Care Inc. engages in cultivation, manufacture, and provision of cannabis products and related services in the United States and internationally. The company offers spanning flower, edibles, oils, and tablets under the Seed & Strain, Triple Seven, Hedy, gLeaf, Classix, Press, and Amber brand names. It holds licenses in 17 jurisdictions in the United States. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in New York, New York.
General.Address: 680 Fifth Avenue, New York, NY, United States, 10019
